briefTitle: Study of Tranexamic Acid During Air and Ground Medical Prehospital Transport Trial (STAAMP Trial)
officialTitle: Study of Tranexamic Acid During Air and Ground Medical Prehospital Transport Trial For Trauma Patients At Risk Of Hemorrhage (STAAMP Trial); Phase III Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized, Double Blind, Interventional Trial
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if 1 gram of prehospital tranexamic acid given during emergency medical transport to a level 1 trauma center in patients at risk of hemorrhage is associated with lower 30 day mortality.
